DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate influence lidocaine temperature pain injection lidocaine . Each participant receive three injection subcutaneously abdomen different temperature . After injection , participant ask evaluate pain Visual analog scale ( 0-100 mm ) . It anticipate pain decrease increase temperature . The aim study find simple method pain reduction use clinical practice .
DOC.brief_title: The Influence Lidocaine Temperature Pain During Subcutaneous Administration
DOC.criteria: Age 1865 year Kidney , heart liver disease Eczema psoriasis injection site Neuropathy Regular use painkiller Hypersensitivity Lidocaine Pregnancy Diabetes
